name: Hike Run
description:
Hike Run is an endless runner created for the 269th Weekly Game Jam. This is my first complete game! Collect coins and avoid hazards to get a high score. Powerups can help you take out some of the obstacles in your path.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys

(The high score doesn't save when the game is closed. I wasn't able to figure out how. Maybe next time!)
